main.name: Brandon Brown
main.description: I'm passionate about web design, music and gaming. I welcome teamwork and am open to collaborating with other developers on projects. Please feel free to contact me about any project collaborations or job opportunities
main.bio: I am an open minded and dedicated creative. While growing up I always enjoyed building and the obstacles that came with it, whether it was an art project or putting a desk together. Having this passion, I gravitated towards coding when I was accepted into college because it showed me a new way to build and be hands-on. After college, I searched for ways to stay active in and increase my knowledge of coding. I was accepted into the Pursuit Fellowship program where I experienced what it was like to build as a team. I am grateful to have worked alongside a diverse group of individuals whom shared many challenges and were able to learn from each other. I aspire to use my creativity alongside my great problem solving skills to deliver a frictionless user experience.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me for any opportunities!

resume.skillmessage: Here are technologies that I know and use to build projects

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Lead the integration of a new font interface into the marketplace application. Worked with software development and testing team members to design and develop robust solutions to meet client requirements for functionality, scalability, and performance. Updated old code bases to modern development standards, improving functionality. Integrated third-party tools and components into applications. Tested methodology with writing and execution of test plans, debugging and testing scripts and tools.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: Enrolled in intensive 1-year, Google-funded software engineering fellowship with a 9% acceptance rate. Used JavaScript, SQL and HTML to develop app-solutions. Reviewed code, debugged problems, and corrected issues.

work.title: Visual Merchandiser
work.description: Recommend, selected, and helped locate or obtain merchandise based on customer needs and desires. Answered customer's questions, and provided information on procedures or policies. Assisted with duties in other areas of the store, such as monitoring fitting rooms, or handled cash and credit transactions. Trained more than 10+ newly hired associates. Set up displays of merchandise on walls, collets, or tables to attract customers and promote sales.

work.title: Technical Support Specialist
work.description: Assisted customers in identifying issues and explained solutions to restore service and functionality. Resolved a diverse range of technical issues across multiple systems and applications for customers and end-users across various time zones. Documented support interactions for future reference. Explained technical information in clear terms to promote better understanding for non-technical users.

projects.title: Tinni
projects.category: A website to seamlessly craft and save an itinerary

projects.title: Flashbook
projects.category: A remake of the well known social media website, Facebook.

projects.title: Soothe
projects.category: A website that displays the weather and an alarm feature, providing users a soother way to start their mornings.
